desc_en: Webcenter Compare function
Users/Groups have than the ability to create a new Client on Portal, they can also edit existing clients.
Users or groups can have the right to see/edit/delete Archive jobs
User can switch to a different clients from "Home", as long as he member of the the other client.
User can see the CSV Export Button in the Job lists, so that they can export the jobs into CSV file.
This will allow the users to save jobs/Archive/Project lists views as standard view. The Standard/Default view will be shown for new users that didn't create there own view yet.
This rights allow users to upload/delete files under "General Files" at the home page
This right is for manage the email templates that used from portal to send out e.g when some event is triggered through a status change.
This right give the user the ability to see/manage the Tabs Items under the "Options/Tabs" menu
This right give the user the ability to see/manage the "Tabs" under the "Options" menu
This right allow users to see/manage the a limited amount of helptables and helptables items. Under [user]/Rights/Helptables can you define whic helptables can this user see/manage.
This right allow users to see the Debugging messages. Is useful for developers.
This right allow users to see the button on a joblist (job/arc) to export the reporting table.
This right allow users to see the "History" tab in job form.
This right allow users to manage the portal services. This right should be given only for system administrators.
This right allow users to manage the portal rights. This right should be given only for system administrators.
This right allow users to manage the portal Logs. This right should be given only for system administrators.
This right allow users to manage the Event types that used in the workflow. Usually only unlimited administrators should have this right.
This right allow users to manage the Critical Path/Workflow. Usually only unlimited administrators should have this right.

This right allow users to manage the "Conditions" under the options menu. These conditions could be Simple, AND, OR, APL conditions, and could be used in the workflow to show a certain Status change button or to change a value of an job field according to a certain condition.
This right allow users to activate or deactivate receiving apl invitation Emails.
This is the user-conditions right. With these conditions can you define for some groups/users to see only jobs where they are selected as a group/user in an user-group selection field in jobs.

This give the user the ability to see and download the XFDF from WC via SDK. The XFDF file contains the WC comments.
This Right is connected also to the >job-download-pdf< right. If you do not have the right to see the pdf download link, you will not be able to see the xfdf link too.
desc_de:
Gibt den Benutzer die Möglichkeit den XFDF download Link zu sehen.
XFDF ist die Datei die WC Anmerkungen enthält.
Das Recht ist natürlich mit dem >job-download-pdf< Recht verbunden, wer nicht den PDF Download link nicht sehen kann, kann die XFDF nicht sehen.

desc_en: This give the user the ability to see and download the PDF from WC via SDK
desc_de: Gibt den Benutzer die Möglichkeit den PDF download Link zu sehen.

desc_en: The right to manage events, that be could used in the workflow when status change is fired.
Structuregroup administration for Approval Workflows
Right to see the Canto Cumulus / Assets page on Home. This page is mainly used by Intouch UK.
desc_de: Right to see the Canto Cumulus / Assets page on Home. This page is mainly used by Intouch UK.

desc_en: Right to manage the portal job fields. This right should be given only for unlimited System Administrators.
Right to manage the checklists that used for Users/Groups in APL.
Right to manage the Checklists Items
Maintain a list of available Approval Loop Types. Set options for Approval Loops.
desc_de: Die Liste der verfügbaren Korrekturumlauf-Arten administrieren. Optionen für Korrekturumläufe setzen.

desc_en: Jobs -> Files Tab + Upload Button(Insert)
gives the users the privilege to annotate WC or Dalim even if they are not active Revisor, but they will not be able to annotate if annotations mode is prohibited in the web status
desc_de: Benutzer können annotieren, selbst wenn die nicht aktive im Umlauf eingeladen sind. Die können aber trotzdem nicht annotieren wenn es in der Webstatus verboten istl.

desc_en: Allow users/groups to see/generate reporting from "Reporting" Tab
Allow Users to upload documents under files-Documents
Allow users to switch between the available portal languages.
Allow users to see/manage the complete list of the Helptables and Helptables items.
Allow users to see/edit/delete the global views by the job/project list
Allow users to see the generated email by an status change.
desc_de: Erlaube die Nutzer, die emails und deren Inhalte zu sehen, die bei einem Status change generiert wurden.

desc_en: Allow users to see a direct Link to the 5Flow Service Portal in the menu at the homepage.
desc_de: Allow users to see a direct Link to the 5Flow Service Portal in the menu at the homepage.

desc_en: Allow users to manage the portal preferences. This right should be given only for system administrators.

Allow users to create a new language in the portal. Allow also the users to switch to the independent mand (mand 0).

This should be only given to system administrators.
Allow user to see the Option Tab. This right must be given only for Admins.
Allow the users to see the APL block(New Email Button) under the Approval Workflow Tab in the job sheet.
Allow the user to see an group selection field on the apl tasks header. This allow than the user to the Apl tasks of a certain user. The group selection filter should be defined in the cfg file.
desc_de: Allow the user to see an group selection field on the apl tasks header. This allow than the user to the Apl tasks of a certain user. The group selection filter should be defined in the cfg file.

name_de: Can give rights to change Mand
name_en: Can give rights to change Mand

code: This right allow users to see the notification center (my inbox) section on the home-task page.\r\nThis right allow users as well to see the (Need Response) field in the job notification mask.
